parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username used to authenticate with the service. Username and password credentials are only required to run your application locally or outside of Bluemix. When running on Bluemix, the credentials will be automatically loaded from the `VCAP_SERVICES` environment variable.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password used to authenticate with the service. Username and password credentials are only required to run your application locally or outside of Bluemix. When running on Bluemix, the credentials will be automatically loaded from the `VCAP_SERVICES` environment variable.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Input text in UTF-8 encoding. Multiple entries will result in multiple translations in the response.

parameters.name: model_id
parameters.description: Model ID of the translation model to use. If this is specified, the **source** and **target** parameters will be ignored. The method requires either a model ID or both the **source** and **target** parameters.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Language code of the source text language. Use with `target` as an alternative way to select a translation model. When `source` and `target` are set, and a model ID is not set, the system chooses a default model for the language pair (usually the model based on the news domain).

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Language code of the translation target language. Use with source as an alternative way to select a translation model.
